summary: The Schwertleite Set by XenoGenesis/XiNAVRO now for the UNPB body.
descriptionHtml:
I ran into this armor recently and noticed that there was only the original CBBE version and a conversion to UNP. I decided to work on converting this armor over to UNPB as something to take my mind off of another mod I\'ve been working on. 

*coughcough* [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34100/?]plug[/url]*coughcough* 
======================

This mod converts the Schwertleite Set to UNPB, with weight slider support.

If you want to put up a picture of your character showing off the armor, go ahead. I really enjoy seeing other characters. Don\'t be shy, I won\'t bite (hard).


======================

Requirements: 

This conversion does require the original mod, which you can get [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19665]here[/url]. Just install that one and replace it with the files from mine.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20227/?]UNPB[/url]



======================

Credits:

XenoGenesis- For the original armor
asianboy345- For the UNP meshes that made things easier to convert to UNPB
MrTroubleMaker- For the UNPB body
author: RoboNixon
